headline: Southwest Airlines (LUV): Assessing Valuation After a 17% One‑Month Share Price Rebound
summary: Southwest Airlines stock: what recent gains might be telling investors Southwest Airlines (LUV) has quietly climbed about 17% over the past month and 20% in the past 3 months, prompting investors to revisit whether this recovery streak reflects lasting fundamentals or just improving sentiment. See our latest analysis for Southwest Airlines. That recent momentum sits on top of a 14.3% year to date share price return and a 16.2% one year total shareholder return, hinting that investors are...
